mapper.sql: applicant_id, user_id, fullname, gender, phone, identity_type, identity_no, nation, native_place, degree, politics, company, seniority, photo_path, study_addr, occupation, application_level
mapper.insert: insert into applicant(applicant_id, user_id, fullname, gender, phone, identity_type, identity_no, nation, native_place, degree, politics, company, seniority, photo_path, study_addr, occupation, application_level) values(#{applicantId}, #{userId}, #{fullname}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{identityType}, #{identityNo}, #{nation}, #{nativePlace}, #{degree}, #{politics}, #{company}, #{seniority}, #{photoPath}, #{studyAddr}, #{occupation}, #{applicationLevel})
mapper.update:
update applicant
applicant_id = #{applicantId},
user_id = #{userId},
fullname = #{fullname},
gender = #{gender},
phone = #{phone},
identity_type = #{identityType},
identity_no = #{identityNo},
nation = #{nation},
native_place = #{nativePlace},
degree = #{degree},
politics = #{politics},
company = #{company},
seniority = #{seniority},
photo_path = #{photoPath},
study_addr = #{studyAddr},
occupation = #{occupation},
application_level = #{applicationLevel},
where applicant_id = #{applicantId}
